dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S2111 IS: Yuma Crossing National Heritage Area Reauthorization Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. McCain introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

form.official-title: To reauthorize the Yuma Crossing National Heritage Area.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Yuma Crossing National Heritage Area Reauthorization Act.

section.header: Reauthorization of Yuma crossing national heritage area
section.text: Section 7 of the Yuma Crossing National Heritage Area Act of 2000 (16 U.S.C. 461 note; Public Law 106â€“319; 114 Stat. 1284) is amended by striking 2015 and inserting 2030.
